title: Ranking
body:
Hello, I've been wondering about ranking with my main which is Jhin.  I don't know if I should one trick to climb up in rank. Please give advice. I would like advice from a challenger.

Thank You

replies.body: Not a Challenger, nor does this post really fit in with the rest of Help & Support, but most people I find do 1/2 trick when doing ranked. Try to pick someone you love and pretty much understand their strengths and weaknesses, but also be sure to have a backup in case you don't get your role or your main gets banned!
